definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: encampment, battlement (fr. idea of surrounding, enclosure; Syr. t.yoro0 sheepfold, e)/pauliv)—cstr. [[טִירַת]] Ct So 8:9; [[טִירָתָם]] Ps 69:25; pl. [[טִירוֹת]] Ez Eze 46:23; sf. [[טִירׂתָם]] Nu 31:10, Ge 25:16; [[טִירוֹתָם]] 1Ch 6:39; [[טִירוֹתֵיהֶם]] Ez Eze 25:4; —

encampment, esp. of circular encampment of nomad tribes, mentioned with [[חחר]] Ge 25:16; with [[ערים]] Nu 31:10, Ez Eze 25:4 (‖[[מִשׁכניהם]]); encampment (poet.) = habitation Ps 69:26 (‖[[אהליהם ]]); more gen., 1Ch 6:39 (‖[[מושׁבות]]).
in metaph. [[כָָּסֶף]] ´[[ט]] Ct So 8:9 a battlement of silver.
row of stones, only pl. [[טִירוֹת]] Ez Eze 46:23, virtually pl. of [[טוּר]]
